title: Winter Shopping List: WTB Several Low Grade T206 HOFers
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: Winter Shopping List: WTB Several Low Grade T206 HOFers
posts.post_content:
Looking for several low grade T206 Hall of Famers - PSA or SGC 1-2. I'm good with creasing but would prefer no writing or significant paper loss on the front or back. Any back is fine. Not going to be able to buy them all, but would love to see what is out there and come home with a few of them.  Looking for:

Cy Young (Portrait)
Homerun Baker
Eddie Collins
Rube Waddell (Portrait) 
Mordecai Brown (Any)
John McGraw (Glove at Hip or Portrait with Cap)

Posting in the other threads for 30s-40s and 50s shopping lists as well.

If you have anything you're looking for move, please shoot me a PM. Thanks, all.
